section.label: Collaborate with us
section.title: Sponsors & Hosters
section.description: Want to support Valencia's product community? Join as a sponsor or host our events at your space.

sponsor.title: Become a Sponsor
sponsor.description: Support our events financially and gain visibility with Valencia's most active product community.

hoster.title: Host an Event
hoster.description: Have an office, coworking, or venue? Let us host an event there and we'll thank you publicly.

community.title: Community access
community.description: Connect with product, design, and tech professionals from Valencia.

visibility.title: Brand visibility
visibility.description: Your logo on our website, social media, and during events.

form.title: Contact us
form.description: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you.
form.typeLabel: How do you want to collaborate?
form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholderSponsor: Tell us about your company and how you'd like to collaborate...
form.messagePlaceholderHoster: Tell us about your space, capacity, location...
form.successDescription: We'll get back to you soon.
